name: A MOD PLAYERS FOR AMIGA
description:
This is a MOD PLAYER Example from AMOS PRO i have compiled and adjusted to run in WORKBENCH 3.1.4 3.2. 

It was a great surprise when i have found it, before i have programmed a simple mod player but this one is what i would like to do.

It can load songs from a menu in a folder you have saved the songs.
